title: School Idol Rangers?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Fast like the wind! Yellow Cat - Rin nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Burning like a flame! Red Bulldozer - Setsuna!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That was a good introduction nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah! This park’s slide is a great place to do self-introduction.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, Setsuna-san. Don’t we need more members in the school idol rangers?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Rin-san.... I was thinking of the same thing. The two of us alone aren’t enough to protect this world.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s right! Then, let’s go recruit some people nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Right on! Ah, over there is....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin saw some candidates too!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s recruit some great heroes~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
